name: D.T.A.D. (Don't Text And Drive)
description:
Pro-Driver [ ✔ ]  - Serial Texter [ ✔ ]

Then open your eyes and stay in your lane, Buddy!

D.T.A.D. is a Text-Response game that challenges your Cognitive skills as well as your Motor skills... Literally! 

So lets go for a Test Drive and find out why you shouldn't Text & Drive!

-Created By Brandon Jamison-Frankola
